resources.string: Permission is granted. You can use the camera now.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is granted. The app can enter code automatically.
Sms reading access is required to read verification code.
Permission is granted. You can manipulate your device files.
In order to manipulate the files, it is necessary to grant the manage storage permission
Permission is granted. You can now draw content over the apps.
In order to draw content on other apps, it is necessary to grant the draw overlay permission
All permission are granted. You can use all features of the app.
This feature requires allowing the %s permission from app settings
